info.title: ETSI GS MEC 012 - Radio Network Information API
info.description: The ETSI MEC ISG MEC012 Radio Network Information API described using OpenAPI.

externalDocs.description: ETSI GS MEC 012 Radio Network Information API, V2.1.1

get.summary: Retrieve information on Radio Access Bearers
get.description: Queries information about the Radio Access Bearers

get.summary: Retrieve information on the underlying Mobile Network that the MEC application is associated to
get.description: Queries information about the Mobile Network

get.summary: Retrieve S1-U bearer information related to specific UE(s)
get.description: Queries information about the S1 bearer(s)
Queries information about the layer 2 measurements.

200.description: Successful response to layer2 measurements info request

get.summary: Retrieve information on subscriptions for notifications
get.description: Queries information on subscriptions for notifications

200.description: Response body contains the list of links to requestors subscriptions.

post.description: Creates a new subscription to Radio Network Information notifications

post.summary: Callback POST used to send a notification
post.description: Notification from RNIS, content based on subscription type

get.summary: Retrieve information on current specific subscription
get.description: Queries information about an existing subscription, identified by its self-referring URI returned on creation (initial POST)

put.description: Updates an existing subscription, identified by its self-referring URI returned on creation (initial POST)

200.description: Successful subscription to response to subscription notifications

delete.description: Cancels an existing subscription, identified by its self-referring URI returned on creation (initial POST)

400.description: Bad Request : used to indicate that incorrect parameters were passed to the request.

401.description: Unauthorized :  used when the client did not submit credentials.

403.description: Forbidden :  operation is not allowed given the current status of the resource.

404.description: Not Found :  used when a client provided a URI that cannot be mapped to a valid resource URI.

406.description: Not Acceptable : used to indicate that the server cannot provide the any of the content formats supported by the client.

412.description: Precondition failed :  used when a condition has failed during conditional requests, e.g. when using ETags to avoid write conflicts when using PUT

414.description: URI Too Long : used to indicate that the server is refusing to process the request because the request URI is longer than the server is willing or able to process.

415.description: Unsupported Media Type :  used to indicate that the server or the client does not support the content type of the entity body.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity : used to indicate that the server understands the content type of the request entity and that the syntax of the request entity is correct but that the server is unable to process the contained instructions. This error condition can occur if an JSON request body is syntactically correct but semantically incorrect, for example if the target area for the request is considered too large. This error condition can also occur if the capabilities required by the request are not supported.

application/problem+json.title: Too many targets
application/problem+json.detail: The target area for the request is considered too large

429.description: Too Many Requests : used when a rate limiter has triggered.

Path.subscrId.name: subscriptionId
Path.subscrId.description: Subscription Id, specifically the "Self-referring URI" returned in the subscription request

Query.AppInsIdArr.name: app_ins_id
Query.AppInsIdArr.description: Comma separated list of Application instance identifiers

Query.CellId.name: cell_id
Query.CellId.description: Comma separated list of E-UTRAN Cell Identities

Query.UeIpv4Address.name: ue_ipv4_address
Query.UeIpv4Address.description: Comma separated list of IE IPv4 addresses as defined for the type for AssociateId

Query.UeIpv6Address.name: ue_ipv6_address
Query.UeIpv6Address.description: Comma separated list of IE IPv6 addresses as defined for the type for AssociateId

Query.NatedIpAddress.name: nated_ip_address
Query.NatedIpAddress.description: Comma separated list of IE NATed IP addresses as defined for the type for AssociateId

Query.GtpTeid.name: gtp_teid
Query.GtpTeid.description: Comma separated list of GTP TEID addresses as defined for the type for AssociateId

Query.ErabIdArr.name: erab_id
Query.ErabIdArr.description: Comma separated list of E-RAB identifiers

Query.Qci.name: qci
Query.Qci.description: QoS Class Identifier as defined in ETSI TS 123 401

Query.ErabMbrDl.name: erab_mbr_dl
Query.ErabMbrDl.description: Maximum downlink E-RAB Bit Rate as defined in ETSI TS 123 401

Query.ErabMbrUl.name: erab_mbr_ul
Query.ErabMbrUl.description: Maximum uplink E-RAB Bit Rate as defined in ETSI TS 123 401

Query.ErabGbrDl.name: erab_gbr_dl
Query.ErabGbrDl.description: Guaranteed downlink E-RAB Bit Rate as defined in ETSI TS 123 401

Query.ErabGbrUl.name: erab_gbr_ul
Query.ErabGbrUl.description: Guaranteed uplink E-RAB Bit Rate as defined in ETSI TS 123 401

Query.TempUeId.name: temp_ue_id
Query.TempUeId.description: Comma separated list of temporary identifiers allocated for the specific UE as defined in   ETSI TS 136 413

Query.DlGbrPrbUsageCell.name: dl_gbr_prb_usage_cell
Query.DlGbrPrbUsageCell.description: PRB usage for downlink GBR traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlGbrPrbUsageCell.name: ul_gbr_prb_usage_cell
Query.UlGbrPrbUsageCell.description: PRB usage for uplink GBR traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlNonGbrPrbUsageCell.name: dl_nongbr_prb_usage_cell
Query.DlNonGbrPrbUsageCell.description: PRB usage for downlink non-GBR traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlNonGbrPrbUsageCell.name: ul_nongbr_prb_usage_cell
Query.UlNonGbrPrbUsageCell.description: PRB usage for uplink non-GBR traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlTotalPrbUsageCell.name: dl_total_prb_usage_cell
Query.DlTotalPrbUsageCell.description: PRB usage for total downlink traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlTotalPrbUsageCell.name: ul_total_prb_usage_cell
Query.UlTotalPrbUsageCell.description: PRB usage for total uplink traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.ReceivedDedicatedPreamblesCell.name: received_dedicated_preambles_cell
Query.ReceivedDedicatedPreamblesCell.description: Received dedicated preambles in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.ReceivedRandomPreamblesLowRangeCel.name: received_randomly_selected_preambles_low_range_cell
Query.ReceivedRandomPreamblesLowRangeCel.description: Received randomly selected preambles in the low range in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.ReceivedRandomPreamblesHighRangeCe.name: received_randomly_selected_preambles_high_range_cell
Query.ReceivedRandomPreamblesHighRangeCe.description: Received rendomly selected preambles in the high range in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.NumberOfActiveUeDlGbrCell.name: number_of_active_ue_dl_gbr_cell
Query.NumberOfActiveUeDlGbrCell.description: Number of active UEs with downlink GBR traffic as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.NumberOfActiveUeUlGbrCell.name: number_of_active_ue_ul_gbr_cell
Query.NumberOfActiveUeUlGbrCell.description: Number of active UEs with uplink GBR traffic as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.NumberOfActiveUeDlNonGbrCell.name: number_of_active_ue_dl_nongbr_cell
Query.NumberOfActiveUeDlNonGbrCell.description: Number of active UEs with downlink non-GBR traffic as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.NumberOfActiveUeUlNonGbrCell.name: number_of_active_ue_ul_nongbr_cell
Query.NumberOfActiveUeUlNonGbrCell.description: Number of active UEs with uplink non-GBR traffic as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlGbrPdrCell.description: Packet discard rate for downlink GBR traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlGbrPdrCell.name: ul_gbr_pdr_cell
Query.UlGbrPdrCell.description: Packet discard rate for uplink GBR traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlNonGbrPdrCell.description: Packet discard rate for downlink non-GBR traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlNonGbrPdrCell.name: ul_nongbr_pdr_cell
Query.UlNonGbrPdrCell.description: Packet discard rate for uplink non-GBR traffic in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlGbrDelayUe.description: Packet delay of downlink GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlGbrDelayUe.name: ul_gbr_delay_ue
Query.UlGbrDelayUe.description: Packet delay of uplink GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlNonGbrDelayUe.description: Packet delay of downlink non-GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlNonGbrDelayUe.name: ul_nongbr_delay_ue
Query.UlNonGbrDelayUe.description: Packet delay of uplink non-GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlGbrPdrUe.name: dl_gbr_pdr_ue
Query.DlGbrPdrUe.description: Packet discard rate of downlink GBR traffic of a UE in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlGbrPdrUe.name: ul_gbr_pdr_ue
Query.UlGbrPdrUe.description: Packet discard rate of uplink GBR traffic of a UE in percentage as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlNonGbrPdrUe.name: dl_nongbr_pdr_ue

Query.UlNonGbrPdrUe.name: ul_nongbr_pdr_ue

Query.DlGbrThroughputUe.description: Scheduled throughput of downlink GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlGbrThroughputUe.description: Scheduled throughput of uplink GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlNonGbrThroughputUe.description: Scheduled throughput of downlink non-GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlGbrDataVolumeUe.name: dl_gbr_data_volume_ue
Query.DlGbrDataVolumeUe.description: Data volume of downlink GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlGbrDataVolumeUe.name: ul_gbr_data_volume_ue
Query.UlGbrDataVolumeUe.description: Data volume of uplink GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.DlNonGbrDataVolumeUe.name: dl_nongbr_data_volume_ue
Query.DlNonGbrDataVolumeUe.description: Data volume of downlink non-GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.UlNonGbrDataVolumeUe.name: ul_nongbr_data_volume_ue
Query.UlNonGbrDataVolumeUe.description: Data volume of uplink non-GBR traffic of a UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 314

Query.SubscriptionType.name: subscription_type
Query.SubscriptionType.description: Filter on a specific subscription type. Permitted values: cell_change, rab_est, rab_mod, rab_rel, meas_rep_ue, nr_meas_rep_ue, timing_advance_ue, ca_reconf, s1_bearer.

type.description:
Numeric value (0-255) corresponding to specified type of identifier as following:

0 = reserved.

1 = UE_IPv4_ADDRESS.

2 = UE_IPV6_ADDRESS.

3 = NATED_IP_ADDRESS.

4 = GTP_TEID.

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the event for a specific UE or flow.

carrierAggregationMeasInfo.description: This parameter can be repeated to contain information of all the carriers assign for Carrier Aggregation up to M.

rsrpNei.description: Reference Signal Received Power as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrpSrv.description: Reference Signal Received Power as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrqNei.description: Reference Signal Received Quality as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrqSrv.description: Reference Signal Received Quality as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

_links.description: Hyperlink related to the resource. This shall be only included in the HTTP responses and in HTTP PUT requests.

callbackReference.description: URI selected by the service consumer to receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information. This shall be included both in the request and in response.

filterCriteriaAssoc.description: List of filtering criteria for the subscription. Any filtering criteria from below, which is included in the request, shall also be included in the response.

appInstanceId.description: Unique identifier for the MEC application instance.

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the information for a specific UE or flow.
0 to N identifiers to associate the event for a specific UE or flow.

hoStatus.description:
Indicate the status of the UE handover procedure. Values are defined as following:

1 = IN_PREPARATION.

2 = IN_EXECUTION.

3 = COMPLETED.

4 = REJECTED.

5 = CANCELLED.

tempUeId.description: The temporary identifier allocated for the specific UE as defined below.

mmec.description: MMEC as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

mtmsi.description: M-TMSI as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

trgEcgi.description:
E-UTRAN Cell Global Identifier of the target cell.
NOTE: Cardinality N is valid only in case of statuses IN_PREPARATION, REJECTED and CANCELLED.

_links.description: Hyperlink related to the resource. This shall be only included in the HTTP responses and in HTTP PUT requests.

callbackReference.description: URI selected by the service consumerto receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information. This shall be included both in the request and in response.

filterCriteriaAssocHo.description: List of filtering criteria for the subscription. Any filtering criteria from below, which is included in the request, shall also be included in the response.

appInstanceId.description: Unique identifier for the MEC application instance.

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the information for a specific UE or flow.

hoStatus.description:
In case hoStatus is not included in the subscription request, the default value 3 = COMPLETED shall be used and included in the response:

1 = IN_PREPARATION.

2 = IN_EXECUTION.

3 = COMPLETED.

4 = REJECTED.

5 = CANCELLED.

CellId.description: String representing the E-UTRAN Cell Identity. Encoded as a bit string (size (28)) as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

_links.description: List of hyperlinks related to the resource.

self.description: Self referring URI. This shall be included in the response from the RNIS. The URI shall be unique within the RNI API as it acts as an ID for the subscription.

cellInfo.description: The per cell measurement information as defined below.

dl_gbr_pdr_cell.description: It indicates the packet discard rate in percentage of the downlink GBR traffic in a cell, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_gbr_prb_usage_cell.description: It indicates the PRB usage for downlink GBR traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11] and ETSI TS 136 423 [i.12].

dl_nongbr_pdr_cell.description: It indicates the packet discard rate in percentage of the downlink non-GBR traffic in a cell, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_nongbr_prb_usage_cell.description: It indicates (in percentage) the PRB usage for downlink non-GBR traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11] and ETSI TS 136 423 [i.12].

dl_total_prb_usage_cell.description: It indicates (in percentage) the PRB usage for total downlink traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11] and ETSI TS 136 423 [i.12].

number_of_active_ue_dl_gbr_cell.description: It indicates the number of active UEs with downlink GBR traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

number_of_active_ue_dl_nongbr_cell.description: It indicates the number of active UEs with downlink non-GBR traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

number_of_active_ue_ul_gbr_cell.description: It indicates the number of active UEs with uplink GBR traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

number_of_active_ue_ul_nongbr_cell.description: It indicates the number of active UEs with uplink non-GBR traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

received_dedicated_preambles_cell.description: It indicates (in percentage) the received dedicated preamples, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

received_randomly_selected_preambles_hig.description: It indicates (in percentage) the received randomly selected preambles in the high range, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

received_randomly_selected_preambles_low.description: It indicates (in percentage) the received randomly selected preambles in the low range, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_gbr_pdr_cell.description: It indicates the packet discard rate in percentage of the uplink GBR traffic in a cell, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_gbr_prb_usage_cell.description: It indicates (in percentage) the PRB usage for uplink GBR traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11] and ETSI TS 136 423 [i.12].

ul_nongbr_pdr_cell.description: It indicates the packet discard rate in percentage of the uplink non-GBR traffic in a cell, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_nongbr_prb_usage_cell.description: It indicates (in percentage) the PRB usage for uplink non-GBR traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11] and ETSI TS 136 423 [i.12].

ul_total_prb_usage_cell.description: It indicates (in percentage) the PRB usage for total uplink traffic, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11] and ETSI TS 136 423 [i.12].

cellUEInfo.description: The per cell per UE layer 2 measurements information as defined below.

dl_gbr_data_volume_ue.description: It indicates the data volume of the downlink GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_gbr_delay_ue.description: It indicates the packet delay of the downlink GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_gbr_pdr_ue.description: It indicates the packet discard rate in percentage of the downlink GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_gbr_throughput_ue.description: It indicates the scheduled throughput of the downlink GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_nongbr_data_volume_ue.description: It indicates the data volume of the downlink non-GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_nongbr_delay_ue.description: It indicates the packet delay of the downlink non-GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_nongbr_pdr_ue.description: It indicates the packet discard rate in percentage of the downlink nonGBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

dl_nongbr_throughput_ue.description: It indicates the scheduled throughput of the downlink nonGBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_gbr_data_volume_ue.description: It indicates the data volume of the uplink GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_gbr_delay_ue.description: It indicates the packet delay of the uplink GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_gbr_pdr_ue.description: It indicates the packet discard rate in percentage of the uplink GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_gbr_throughput_ue.description: It indicates the scheduled throughput of the uplink GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_nongbr_data_volume_ue.description: It indicates the data volume of the uplink non-GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_nongbr_delay_ue.description: It indicates the packet delay of the uplink non-GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_nongbr_pdr_ue.description: It indicates the packet discard rate in percentage of the uplink nonGBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

ul_nongbr_throughput_ue.description: It indicates the scheduled throughput of the uplink non-GBR traffic of a UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 314 [i.11].

rsrp.description: Reference Signal Received Power as defined in ETSI TS 138 331 [i.13].

rsrq.description: Reference Signal Received Quality as defined in ETSI TS 138 331 [i.13].

sinr.description: Reference Signal to Interference & Noise Ratio as defined in ETSI TS 138 331 [i.13].

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the event for a specific UE or flow.

carrierAggregationMeasInfo.description: This parameter can be repeated to contain information of all the carriers assign for Carrier Aggregation up to M.

rsrpNei.description: Reference Signal Received Power as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrpNeiEx.description: Extended Reference Signal Received Power, with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

rsrpSrv.description: Reference Signal Received Power as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrpSrvEx.description: Extended Reference Signal Received Power, with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

rsrqNei.description: Reference Signal Received Quality as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrqNeiEx.description: Extended Reference Signal Received Quality, with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

rsrqSrv.description: Reference Signal Received Quality as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrqSrvEx.description: Extended Reference Signal Received Quality, with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

sinrNei.description: Reference Signal "Signal to Interference plus Noise Ratio", with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

sinrSrv.description: Reference Signal "Signal to Interference plus Noise Ratio", with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

eutranNeighbourCellMeasInfo.description: This parameter can be repeated to contain information of all the neighbouring cells up to N.

rsrp.description: Reference Signal Received Power as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrpEx.description: Extended Reference Signal Received Power, with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

rsrq.description: Reference Signal Received Quality as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrqEx.description: Extended Reference Signal Received Quality, with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

sinr.description: Reference Signal "Signal to Interference plus Noise Ratio", with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

heightUe.description: Indicates height of the UE in meters relative to the sea level as defined in ETSI TS 136.331 [i.7].

newRadioMeasInfo.description: 5G New Radio secondary serving cells measurement information.

nrBNCs.description: Measurement quantities concerning the best neighbours of the secondary serving cells

nrBNCellInfo.description: Best neighbours of the secondary serving cell(s) info

nrBNCellRsrp.description: Reference Signal Received Power measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

nrBNCellRsrq.description: Reference Signal Received Quality measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

nrBNCellRssi.description: Reference signal SINR measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

nrCarrierFreq.description: ARFCN applicable for a downlink, uplink or bi-directional (TDD) NR carrier frequency, as defined in ETSI TS 138.101 [i.15].

nrSCs.description: Measurement quantities concerning the secondary serving cells.

nrSCellRsrp.description: Reference Signal Received Power measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

nrSCellRsrq.description: Reference Signal Received Quality measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

nrSCellRssi.description: Reference signal SINR measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

newRadioMeasNeiInfo.description: Measurement quantities concerning the 5G NR neighbours.

nrNCellRsrp.description: Reference Signal Received Power measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

nrNCellRsrq.description: Reference Signal Received Quality measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

nrNCellRssi.description: Reference signal SINR measurement according to mapping table in ETSI TS 138.133 [i.14].

rsrp.description: Reference Signal Received Power as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrpEx.description: Extended Reference Signal Received Power, with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

rsrq.description: Reference Signal Received Quality as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

rsrqEx.description: Extended Reference Signal Received Quality, with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

sinr.description: Reference Signal "Signal to Interference plus Noise Ratio", with value mapping defined in ETSI TS 136 133 [i.16].

_links.description: Hyperlink related to the resource. This shall be only included in the HTTP responses and in HTTP PUT requests.

callbackReference.description: URI selected by the service consumer to receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information. This shall be included both in the request and in response.

filterCriteriaAssocTri.description: List of filtering criteria for the subscription. Any filtering criteria from below, which is included in the request, shall also be included in the response.

appInstanceId.description: Unique identifier for the MEC application instance.

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the information for a specific UE or flow.

trigger.description: Corresponds to a specific E-UTRAN UE Measurement Report trigger.

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the event for a specific UE or flow.

timingAdvance.description: The timing advance as defined in ETSI TS 136 214 [i.5].

_links.description: Hyperlink related to the resource. This shall be only included in the HTTP responses and in HTTP PUT requests.

callbackReference.description: URI selected by the service consumer to receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information. This shall be included both in the request and in response.

filterCriteriaAssoc.description: List of filtering criteria for the subscription. Any filtering criteria from below, which is included in the request, shall also be included in the response.

appInstanceId.description: Unique identifier for the MEC application instance.

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the information for a specific UE or flow.

NrCellId.description: String representing the NR Cell Identity. Encoded as a bit string (size (36)) as defined in ETSI TS 138 423 [i.17].

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the event for a specific UE or flow.

eutraNeighCellMeasInfo.description: This parameter can be repeated to contain measurement information of all the neighbouring cells up to N. It shall not be included if nrNeighCellMeasInfo is included.

rsrp.description: Reference Signal Received Power as defined in ETSI TS 138 331 [i.13].

rsrq.description: Reference Signal Received Quality as defined in ETSI TS 138 331 [i.13].

sinr.description: Reference Signal plus Interference Noise Ratio as defined in ETSI TS 138 331 [i.13].

nrNeighCellMeasInfo.description: This parameter can be repeated to contain measurement information of all the neighbouring cells up to N. It shall not be included if eutraNeighCellMeasInfo is included.

servCellMeasInfo.description: This parameter can be repeated to contain information of all the serving cells up to N.

nCell.description: Measurement information relating to the best neighbour of this serving cell.

sCell.description: Measurement information relating to this serving cell.

_links.description: Hyperlink related to the resource. This shall be only included in the HTTP responses and in HTTP PUT requests.

callbackReference.description: URI selected by the service consumer to receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information. This shall be included both in the request and in response.

filterCriteriaNrMrs.description: List of filtering criteria for the subscription. Any filtering criteria from below, which is included in the request, shall also be included in the response.

appInstanceId.description: Unique identifier for the MEC application instance.

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the information for a specific UE or flow.

triggerNr.description: Corresponds to a specific 5G UE Measurement Report trigger.

mcc.description: The Mobile Country Code part of PLMN Identity as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

mnc.description: The Mobile Network Code part of PLMN Identity as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

appInstanceId.description: Unique identifier for the MEC application instance.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem

status.description: The HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

type.description: A URI reference according to IETF RFC 3986 that identifies the problem type

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to bind the event for a specific UE or flow.

erabId.description: The attribute that uniquely identifies a Radio Access bearer for specific UE as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

erabQosParameters.description: QoS parameters for the E-RAB as defined below.

qci.description: QoS Class Identifier as defined in ETSI TS 123 401 [i.4].

qosInformation.description: The QoS information for the E-RAB.

erabGbrDl.description: This attribute indicates the guaranteed downlink E-RAB Bit Rate as defined in ETSI TS 123 401 [i.4] for this bearer.

erabGbrUl.description: This attribute indicates the guaranteed uplink E-RAB Bit Rate as defined in ETSI TS 123 401 [i.4] for this bearer.

erabMbrDl.description: This attribute indicates the maximum downlink E-RAB Bit Rate as defined in ETSI TS 123 401 [i.4] for this bearer.

erabMbrUl.description: This attribute indicates the maximum uplink E-RAB Bit Rate as defined in ETSI TS 123 401 [i.4] for this bearer.

tempUeId.description: The temporary identifier allocated for the specific UE as defined below.

mmec.description: MMEC as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

mtmsi.description: M-TMSI as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

_links.description: Hyperlink related to the resource. This shall be only included in the HTTP responses and in HTTP PUT requests.

callbackReference.description: URI selected by the service consumer to receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information. This shall be included both in the request and in response.

filterCriteriaQci.description: List of filtering criteria for the subscription. Any filtering criteria from below, which is included in the request, shall also be included in the response.

appInstanceId.description: Unique identifier for the MEC application instance.

qci.description: QoS Class Identifier as defined in ETSI TS 123 401 [i.4].

ueInfo.description: Information on UEs in the specific cell as defined below.

s1UeInfo.description: Information on a specific UE as defined below.

associateId.description: 1 to N identifiers to associate the information for a specific UE or flow.

s1BearerInfoDetailed.description: S1 bearer information as defined below.

enbInfo.description: S1 bearer information on eNB side as defined below.

ipAddress.description: eNB transport layer address of this S1 bearer.

tunnelId.description: eNB GTP-U TEID of this S1 bearer.

erabId.description: The attribute that uniquely identifies a S1 bearer for a specific UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

ipAddress.description: SGW transport layer address of this S1 bearer.

tunnelId.description: SGW GTP-U TEID of this S1 bearer.

mmec.description: MMEC as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

mtmsi.description: M-TMSI as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

s1Event.description: The subscribed event that triggered this notification in S1BearerSubscription.

s1UeInfo.description: Information on specific UE that matches the criteria in S1BearerSubscription as defined below.

s1BearerInfo.description: S1 bearer information as defined below.

mtmsi.description: M-TMSI as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

associateId.description: 0 to N identifiers to associate the events for a specific UE or a flow.

erabId.description: The attribute that uniquely identifies a S1 bearer for a specific UE, as defined in ETSI TS 136 413 [i.3].

_links.description: Hyperlink related to the resource. This shall be only included in the HTTP responses and in HTTP PUT requests.

callbackReference.description: URI selected by the service consumer, to receive notifications on the subscribed RNIS information. This shall be included in the request and response.

eventType.description:
Description of the subscribed event. The event is included both in the request and in the response. \nFor the eventType, the following values are currently defined:

0 = RESERVED.

1 = S1_BEARER_ESTABLISH.

2 = S1_BEARER_MODIFY.

3 = S1_BEARER_RELEASE.

_links.description: List of hyperlinks related to the resource.

href.description: The URI referring to the subscription.

subscriptionType.description: Type of the subscription. The string shall be set according to the "subscriptionType" attribute of the associated subscription data type event defined in clause 6.3.

nanoSeconds.description: The nanoseconds part of the time. Time is defined as Unix-time since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

seconds.description: The seconds part of the time. Time is defined as Unixtime since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

Trigger.description:
As defined in Ref ETSI TS 136 331 [i.7]

0 = NOT_AVAILABLE

1 = PERIODICAL_REPORT_STRONGEST_CELLS

2 = PERIODICAL_REPORT_STRONGEST_CELLS_FOR_SON

3 = PERIODICAL_REPORT_CGI

4 = INTRA_PERIODICAL_REPORT_STRONGEST_CELLS

5 = INTRA_PERIODICAL_REPORT_CGI

10 = EVENT_A1

11 = EVENT_A2

12 = EVENT_A3

13 = EVENT_A4

14 = EVENT_A5

15 = EVENT_A6

20 = EVENT_B1

21 = EVENT_B2

20 = EVENT_B1-NR

21 = EVENT_B2-NR

30 = EVENT_C1

31 = EVENT_C2

40 = EVENT_W1

41 = EVENT_W2

42 = EVENT_W3

50 = EVENT_V1

51 = EVENT_V2

60 = EVENT_H1

61 = EVENT_H2

TriggerNr.description:
The enumeration Trigger represents specified triggers for a 5G UE Measurement Report. Full details can be found in ETSI TS 138 331 [i.13]).

0 = NOT_AVAILABLE

1 = NR_PERIODICAL

2 = NR_CGI

10 = EVENT_A1

11 = EVENT_A2

12 = EVENT_A3

13 = EVENT_A4

14 = EVENT_A5

15 = EVENT_A6

20 = INTER_RAT_PERIODICAL

21 = INTER_RAT_CGI

30 = EVENT_B1

31 = EVENT_B2
